successes.title: Relic Knights
successes.description: A brand new science fiction miniatures game full of over the top anime action!

Pledges.description: Doing my Part! - Get a lithograph signed by the Relic Knights team!
Champion of Justice - Special Edition Miniature and a signed lithograph!
Esper Font - Hardback Rulebook, Special Edition Miniature and a signed lithograph!
Mercenary Charter - 1 Faction Starter of your choice and a signed lithograph! Pick your Faction after the Kickstarter ends from any of the unlocked Factions!
Ships free in the USA. Everywhere else, please add $15.

Savior of the Universe! - 2 x Faction Starters of your choice, Hardback Rulebook, and TWO Special Edition miniatures! Pick your Factions after the Kickstarter ends from any of the unlocked Factions (even duplicates)! Early bird special, limited to 100!
Ships free in the USA. Everywhere else, please add $25.

Savior of the Universe! - 2 x Faction Starters of your choice, Hardback Rulebook, and TWO Special Edition miniatures! Pick your Factions after the Kickstarter ends from any of the unlocked Factions (even duplicates)!
Ships free in the USA. Everywhere else, please add $25.

Double Savior - 2 x Savior of the Universe! Two of everything from Savior (i.e. 4 faction starters).Pick your Factions after the Kickstarter ends from any of the unlocked Factions (even duplicates)! Early bird special, limited to 50!
Ships free in the USA, Everywhere else please add $50.
Double Savior - 2 x Savior of the Universe! Two of everything from Savior (i.e. 4 faction starters). Pick your Factions after the Kickstarter ends from any of the unlocked Factions (even duplicates)!
Ships free in the USA, Everywhere else please add $50.

Gotta Get Em All! - 3 x Savior of the Universe! Three of everything from Savior (i.e. 6 faction starter). Pick your Factions after the Kickstarter ends from any of the unlocked Factions (even duplicates)! Early bird special, limited to 30!
Ships free in the USA, Everywhere else please add $75.
